base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Three horizontal drawers, equal size, stacked vertically, centered.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the cabinet framework. The drawers are aligned to fit precisely within the cabinet, allowing for easy access and organization of contents.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a desk. It interacts with users by providing storage space; drawers are opened and closed via handles, facilitating organization.
